name: Bulb Out
storyline: ‘Lights On.. 3..2..1.. Lights Off..3..2..1.. Lights on..3.. WATCH OUT!! Whew!.. That was a close one! You almost hit that obstacle! Pay attention to the screen when the lights are on because when they shut off….you are on your own…! Tap the floating stars, balls, and coins to get extra boosts! Earn Achievements along the way! Play in dual screen mode if you dare! Test your reflexes in this casual fast paced arcade game! “
summary: Lights On.. 3..2..1.. Lights Off..3..2..1.. Lights on..3.. WATCH OUT!! Whew!.. That was a close one! You almost hit that obstacle! Pay attention to the screen when the lights are on because when they shut off….you are on your own…! Tap the floating stars, balls, and coins to get extra boosts! Earn Achievements along the way! Play in dual screen mode if you dare! Test your reflexes in this casual fast paced arcade game!
